meanings.definition: Drink alcohol regularly and in small quantities.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys tippling wine with her friends on weekends.
meanings.sent2: He was tippling beer while watching the game.
meanings.sent3: The cat was tippling milk from a tiny saucer.
meanings.sent4: The flowers seemed to be tippling the raindrops in the gentle shower.
meanings.sent5: The sound of tippling water in the fountain was soothing.

meanings.definition: A person who drinks alcohol regularly and in small quantities.
meanings.sent1: The tippling gentleman frequented the local pub.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the tippling queen of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The tippling enthusiast always had a glass in hand.
meanings.sent4: The tippling bird in the garden seemed to enjoy sipping nectar.
meanings.sent5: The tippling group of friends gathered for their nightly drinks.
